name: Telescope Words A-Z Quiz Series - J and K | Brain Teasers | 10 Questions

questions.text:
I will give you three clues, and you must answer the clues.  Just type the longest word, NOT all three.  The first clue begins with either a J or K, the second word drops the first letter, and the third words drops the first letter one more time.  For instance, if the clue reads "Beverage - Hockey arena - Pen fluid", the answers would be "Drink - Rink - Ink", but to answer, you will only type the longest word, in this case "Drink".  Remember, only type the longest word in as your answer!

These first five will start with a J.

Prank - Canadian author Janette - Kevin Grivois stage name
Green stone - Lemon or lime fruit drink - Delaware

This one has four clues!

Fighting with spears on horseback - Banishing - Austrian place - Bee attack
questions.explanation:
Jousting.

	Jousting - Ousting - Usting - Sting This can even go further to say grapefruit soda, which would be Ting, and a FunTrivia member, which would be Ing!

questions.text:
All answers will now begin with K!

To make out of wool - Louse egg - That thing; Stephen King novel
Be well informed - At this moment - Ouch!
Medieval soldier - Dark time - Randy Jackson phrase; "That's _ dawg!"
Trickster - Old English hub of a wheel - Street address abbreviation
